text:

prompt: What are the pros and cons of social media?
text:
What are the pros and cons of social media?

Online social media does not guarantee that you will remain well connected and stay productive. The pros and con of using social media are based purely on your personal circumstances, your habits and who you want to communicate your message to. Your personal circumstances alone will never decide the type of person you want them to be, but their needs, preferences and lifestyle will be a lot more determined by where they are
